tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ewaste_recycling_companies (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    services TEXT,
    certifications VARCHAR(100),
    contact_person VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_companies (
    company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    services TEXT,
    certifications TEXT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_companies (
 company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 services TEXT,
 certifications TEXT,
 contact_person VARCHAR(100),
 contact_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_services (
 service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 service_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT,
 company_id UUID REFERENCES recycling_companies(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE company_certifications (
 certification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 certification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 issue_date DATE,
 expiry_date DATE,
 company_id UUID REFERENCES recycling_companies(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_companies (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    certification_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issued_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    company_id INT REFERENCES recycling_companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_companies (
  company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  services TEXT[],
  certifications TEXT[],
  contact_person_name VARCHAR(100),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_services (
  service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  service_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  service_description TEXT,
  company_id UUID REFERENCES recycling_companies(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE certifications (
  certification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  certification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  issuing_organization VARCHAR(255),
  valid_until DATE,
  company_id UUID REFERENCES recycling_companies(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE contact_details (
  contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  company_id UUID REFERENCES recycling_companies(company_id),
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  website VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_locations (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  address TEXT,
  contact_person_name VARCHAR(100),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20),
  company_id UUID REFERENCES recycling_companies(company_id)
)
